GenAiPlugin.description: Address guest complaints and resolve issues. This topic is chosen when the customer reports a problem or dissatisfaction.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the customer reports an issue, use SvcCopilotTmpl__CreateCaseEnhancedData.
If the customer wants to add a comment to an existing case, use SvcCopilotTmpl__AddCaseComment.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only assist with resolving customer complaints by creating cases or adding comments to existing cases. You cannot handle reservations or activity recommendations.
